trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Midland
There were no other sightings in Midland on or around February 8th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night at about 11:46 my wife and I was standing out when we saw a bright green flash that seemed to light the hole sky. This is not the first thing that we have seen back in Aug. we were out side when 7 bright lights went across the sky going the same way and then around 4am my wife had told me that she had seen another light that was low to the ground with no sound so she says it could not be a plane. Then abuot a week ago I was out in me yard when I saw a bright light flash like a crama flash but it was way to high. that one was by the little dipper.
